snippet.title: Schizoids - ZX Spectrum Gameplay (Steam Re-Release)
snippet.description:
Originally released in 1983 by Imagine, Schizoids was a classic top-down space game for the ZX Spectrum, where players took on the role of a space junk disposal technician.

Footage from the Steam re-release by Pixel Games UK

#zxspectrum #retrogames #retrogaming #pixelgamesuk #imagine #imaginethenameofthegame #thenameofthegame #schizoids #sinclairzxspectrum
